pullRequest.title: XRDDEV-651 API version
pullRequest.bodyText:
Add basepath /api/v1 into the API servers object to all API endpoints individually and group endpoints by tags
Update Swagger Parser

JIRA: https://jira.niis.org/browse/XRDDEV-651

commit.message:
XRDDEV-651 Add API version

* prefix all paths with /api/v1
* use OpenAPI3 tags to categorize an API path

XRDDEV-651 Fix api url in rest tests

* also add descriptions for api tags
XRDDEV-651 Add API version to base path in frontend

XRDDEV-651 Fix Sonar issues

* RequestMapping -> GetMapping
* renamed some globals

nodes.bodyText:
Could also consider using servers-object to hold the api/v1 prefix? https://swagger.io/docs/specification/api-host-and-base-path/
In that case some small test would be good to verify, that we have some means of having both api/v1 and api/v2 endpoints coexist in the same definition.

commit.message:
XRDDEV-651 Move API basepath into servers-object

* also add swaggerhub test server
